articles.content: Happily, hes just as he appears on the box: friendly, with a propensity to dip in and out of impressions and a gift of the storytelling gab. He stops and starts and answers and is very good at giving… [+8909 chars]

articles.title: Amid coronavirus restrictions, would you pay to see a gig on your phone? Artists hope so - ABC News
articles.description: In the age of lockdown, live music has migrated from clubs and pubs to screens. The question for artists is: will the audience follow?
